## Question
What is the difference in pulse rate between two randomly selected female students in this class?

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(primer.data)
```

```{r}
nhanes
```
```{r}
x = nhanes |>
  filter(gender == "Female") |>
  select(pulse) |>
  drop_na()
```
```{r}
x |>
  ggplot(aes(x = pulse)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1)
```
